FixedPositionChild
FieldPositionChild
FieldPositionManager
FixedPositionManager
Batch
Manager that decides the handlers based on the content of a field in the specified position in a record. The fields in the record are of a fixed length. The data beween the start position and end position is taken as key in the flow-table.
See also
Github - FixedPositionManager Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.batch.FixedPositionRecordHandlerManager
Syntax
Copy
<FixedPositionManager />
Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
startPosition	number	0
Start position of the field in the record that identifies the recordtype (first character is 0)
endPosition	number	-1
If endPosition >= 0 then this field contains the endPosition (Java style, i.e the position of the next character) of the recordtype field in the rec
